Reviews.Title: Not exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Leslie W Ahrens
Reviews.Content: The Note book its self is good. The only issues I have considering the price isthe Notebook is an MSI barebones system.According to MSI tech support the meansno memoryno hard driveno operating system.Amazon is selling this with out letting you know up front and it would appear that looking at the online specs that it does come with16gig of ram and windows 8. That is not the case. For the price you can find a better value someplace else.

Reviews.Title: my opinion
Reviews.Author: zachary johnson
Reviews.Content: i have ordered my laptop from amazon, yes it is empty it only has a motherboard and a graphics card, but its a very decent gaming platform, sporting a fresh new graphics card, 32gbs of ram it can hold total, and 1 tb of memory, granted its going to need a little more money to make the computer whole but for a mobile gaming platform its a great deal vs portability
